data.name: Afterthought Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Soundtrack of Afterthought consists of 4 discs:

- Disc 1: 40 Gameplay Tracks with a total length of 2:23h
- Disc 2: 40 Ambient Tracks with a total length of 2:38h
- Disc 3: 8 Boss Tracks with a total length of 0:32h
- Disc 4: 12 Side and Custscene Tracks with a total length of 0:24h

Explore a wide variety of genres ranging from Techno and Noise to Jazz and Classic Music.

data.short_description: Dive into the surreal and athmospheric soundtrack of Afterthought. The 4 Discs contain all Gameplay, Ambient, Boss and Cutscene Tracks from the game. Explore a wide variety of genres ranging from Techno and Noise to Jazz and Classic Music.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 5300 MB available space
